website_summaries.verdict: The Sennheiser RS 175 is a set of wireless headphones intended for home use that offer excellent range and thunderous bass.
pros: Bass mode increases low-end dramatically, but can be disabled
Excellent transmissionâ€”never stuttered during testing, even through walls
cons: Can distort in Bass mode on deep bass tracks at high volumes

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SOUND QUALITY BUT NOT FOR LIFE!
customer_reviews.text: Been pleased with these since I bought them on 23rd November 2015 (3 days out of warranty). Last night they decided to stop charging. Changed the batteries (fully charged) but still they are showing, by the red indicator light, that they needed charging and then cut out. No matter what I do, no success. I have checked numerous forums and thuis seems to be a common problem. Not what I would expect from something costing in excess of £150. Going to see if Seinheiser are ameanable to honouring teh warranty.Wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: Absolute Novice

customer_reviews.title: Harsh treble.
customer_reviews.text: Bought after reading rave reviews everywhere to use for listening to movies and TV via my TV headphone socket. Comfy enough but the sound quality was awful. Very harsh treble made voices unbearable. I tried using the optical connection instead, just in case the TV couldn't drive them adequately, but that made no discernible difference. Returned and have ordered some new earpads for my aging beyerdynamic dtx 800 headphones instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Yes these are expensive, yes you can buy cheaper BUT the quality shows as soon as you put these on. The sound is crystal clear No hiss, No crackles nothing but pure sound. I was dubious as I have bought Bluetooth ones in the past and had loads of latency problems. I needed Headphones that were in perfect time, had a great sound and were wire free and thankfully its 3 out of 3! You are paying top dollar but you are getting your moneys worth with these. I have over 10k worth of sound gear in my home studio and these make all my expense pay off and sound fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Hamy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as my previous set expired a few months back after 7 years. Use them all the time to listen to the tv after the wife’s gone to bed, excellent sound and very comfortable for extended viewing. Maybe not the highest quality for hi if usage but as my hearing is poor I wouldn’t benefit from anything better. Well recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. A. Lye

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphones with great bass.comfortable and wireless too once you connect your sound source to the charging tower/amp thingy.charges up fairly quick after the initial charge and lasts ages.a word of advice though.first adjust the volume on your device before adjusting on the headphones to make sure it’s loud or quiet enough.my one issue is they feel a tiny bit plastic like when u feel them but you’re not really supposed to sit there feeling them I guess.theyre also great for watching tv when the mrs is on the phone or p**nhub.com when she goes to bed...very realistic 😂
customer_reviews.author: Mark.O

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy indeed with the quality of sound and the range. I can move to any point in my house without losing connection and a fair distance in to the garden too - not that I need to. And they are very comfortable to wear even though my head is on the narrow side there is no looseness. So yes, these H/P's are great. Soon get used to operating the volume base controls on the H/P's.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great but sweaty
customer_reviews.text: I use these while doing light exercises a couple of rooms away from the source. Normal bluetooth doesn't reach this far, which is why I bought the RS175. From time to time I get some "ghost sounds" (interference, I presume), but the signal has to pass several (internal) brick walls. My ears get quite sweaty after an hours light exercises. They are NOT noise-canceling, but they block external noise well, fitting around the ear as they do; this of course explains the sweating. I am quite happy with them, although I thought the price steep when I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: N. Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great. built and designed by Yugo/Lada/crap manufacturer of your choice!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds is great as you would expect from Sennheiser. Designed and built to be as cheap as possible. Headphones don't fit well over ears. It feels plasticky, flimsy and cheap except it is expensive. The docking station/transmitter looks like it was designed to fit the headphone badly. Quite clever really in a psycho way. I had the RS 180 before this and they were perfect in every way. Shame on you Sennheiser.
customer_reviews.author: thefarhad

customer_reviews.title: Poor range
customer_reviews.text: My RS130 wireless headphones which I bought in 2007 have now had their day, so decided to buy the RS175 as the RS130 were no longer available. Well... what a disappointment, wonderful sound, couldn't fault i, really comfortable to wear but the range???? I was able to use the RS130 phones all over my garden and there were only a couple of places where the sound cut out, but these new ones - can't go 15 yds outside before the sound cuts out. Such a shame RS1130 are not available any more. Have contacted Sennheiser but not had a reply. Am pretty surprised that at that price they are not up to standard.
customer_reviews.author: J. May

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Having owned several Sennheiser Headphones in the past & loved them I decided to treat myself to some new updated ones. The RS175 seemed to fit my requirements & according to the spec had the same 100m range as my old TR130 & 140's. They don't! My old ones reach the whole of the house & part way up the garden, these do not even reach the top of the stairs - very disappointing. Also the +/- buttons for the volume control are cumbersome & slow to react, that is if they react at all whereas the old roll knob is quick & simple. Not an improvement, I'll stick to the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J A Russell

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use it as PC headphones to avoid cables. The fact that it turn off after some time when there is no sounds coming to it is annoying. Also turning it on, after it turned itself off is tricky process, it is trying to be smart and turn self on automatically but has a delay. The range I would say is also limited, does not work well when I'm on different floor. It think it is nice in overall, great sounds. Just the user interface / experience is not polished enough for a premium brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Firstly they do sound great, they really do
customer_reviews.text: Well its tricky to review these accurately as there are 2 main points. Firstly they do sound great, they really do. But the build quality and feel is really lacking. They feel so flimsy and cheap. The docking stand is all but hollow and falls over easily. For the price they should be considerably more sturdy and luxurious. I personally like the feel of wearing them but others that have tried them haven't. Honestly if they jus felt and looked like high end headphones i would give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bubz

customer_reviews.title: Had for over 3 years...
customer_reviews.text: Tried these in Tokyo in September 2016 and bought them right away on amazon. Having used them for 3 years I have no complaints other than a layer of the fabric on the pads ripping off but it’s fine and that pads are replaceable. Sound quality is great and I use them almost everyday for movies, games and music.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as their first model
customer_reviews.text: perhaps a rethink on the comfort! Having worn these for some time I find they do help stop back ground noise but they are not very comfortable if worn for longer than a couple of hours. I have also noticed the charging dock can be a bit of a fiddle to get that positioned correctly.
customer_reviews.author: P N

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality is excellent. The range is average but adequate. Compared to the RS 120 which I previously owned, these are much more sturdy and won't suffer the fault that killed my previous two sets of headphones (volume wheel failure) because the design prevents it (the RS175 has volume buttons instead) If I had to pick a fault with these headphones it would be that they are very heavy and push quite firmly into the side of your head. This can be a bit uncomfortable at first. It took me a while to get used to wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: R J Dennington

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the Sennheiser brand for performance, sound and quality and these 'phones don't disappoint. Once you've plugged everything into where it needs to go, these are a dream. The power/charging station is decent. You simply place the headphones on top and they charge. Anyone who's ever used gaming headphones will appreciate how much you actually miss out on when you don't wear any. These allow you to pick up even the smallest of background noise and give you a deeper all round experience when watching your favourite shows. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: ScottParky

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband to be able to watch tv while I was on nigh shift without me being disturbed. He tells me the range is excellent and has even been able to garden with them while listening to football on the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Louise S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to block out noise from the road and the apartment above mine. Very good sound quality but the noise cancelling is not as good as I hoped. I have watched a few action movies which sound awesome (Any Star Wars fans out there would be impressed). Bad thing is most noise can still be heard unless the volume is turned up pretty loud which is annoying. I would have researched for longer but I had to make a quick decision so I got these. I would definitely reccomend them though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: well liked
customer_reviews.text: well i have had the 175s before and lasted a few years but since it was Christmas decided to get a new pair and there newer model of the 175 for the TV is a lot better i am over 80% deaf and the sound is clear and even have to turn down the volume something i have never had to do before :) little on the pricey side but as they say you get what you pay for so have given this 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for tv
customer_reviews.text: Bought for both tv and pc which are close together in my front room, it can be connected to both devices at the same time through different connections. had it connected to my pc through the optical but after a few weeks it stopped working with the pc, have tried to get them working again but had no success so far, so for that im giving only 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: heat to the ears
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are excellent sound-wise. I can now hear TV sound without bothering with sub-titles. A downside is that for me they do make my ears hot after 30 minutes or so. Frequency range excellent
customer_reviews.author: 4-6-2 tank

customer_reviews.title: Locate base unit away from tv!
customer_reviews.text: Head lots of interference problem at first but completely resolved problem by fixing a shelf on the wall above tv which gives perfect reception to two headsets simultaneously in use. Really excellent quality since making this change.
customer_reviews.author: brian r

customer_reviews.title: Like and dislike this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them to set up one upstairs and another one downstairs for watching film at night without make a noise, the sound is absolutely perfect, everything about this product is perfect except one thing, when I use the upstairs one but I move from 1st floor to ground floor it have no sound, I mean, it is perfect if you use it the same level of your house ( downstairs or upstairs ), it does not work if you move different level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not ask for more
customer_reviews.text: Just absolutely fantastic. Sound quality is superb, range is incredible and they cancel out noise from your surroundings very well. Noise bleed is more than I would like from a closed back headphone, but the battery life and actually quite convincing virtual surround completely overshadow this. They feel very comfortable and the charging stand is ideal for a desk setup.
customer_reviews.author: Zach C.

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: An excellent piece of kit. The sound qualIty is first class and they are comfortable to wear. Using these ensures no one else in the household is disturbed when the wearer is watching a war film on TV
customer_reviews.author: 2356STOTT

customer_reviews.title: Very good clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Very good clear sound. Range is not as good as my old RS110 i.e. If you wander round the house listening to music it will cut out. Be careful with Sky HD. I had to go into sound settings on Sky box and alter things in order to listen to HD channels. All in all, good headphones.
customer_reviews.author: sdf

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive but wanted good quality sound when watching movies, however very disappointed in the quality of the sound. You can get the same sound out of a 40 pound set of over the ears headset.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Replacement for Earlier Sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: Having owned the earlier Sennheiser RS130 for around 12 years, this was bought as a replacement. It has proved to be excellent, with the same surround sound feature, but great added bass. The stand is more modern and stylish and matches my current cinema and hi-fi system, accompanying it well with great quality sound playback.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: The first pair to arrive had an issue in that the red charging light never turned green even after 48hrs. I returned them for a replacement and can honestly say the sound quality is absolutely excellent, no problem at all with the replacement set.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Great independend headphones
customer_reviews.text: After 3 sets, these did exactly what we required, ie to have separate volumn for TV to headphones. I can now hear the TV at my normal level and my husband have the headphones at his higher volumn. Pease at last! worth the extra money over cheaper options
customer_reviews.author: Claire Newman

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says on the box
customer_reviews.text: We use the devices for TV and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Waring

customer_reviews.title: They are just great! Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Have used these regularly for 10 months now. They are just great! Good sound, good battery life, easy to pair and use. The headphones are comfortable too and shut out quite a lot of ambient sound. The only down side is that I paid about £220 to Amazon....only for the price to be reduced reduced a week later by £100. Nice one Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: mick2606

customer_reviews.title: exelemt product
customer_reviews.text: the do what is expected from headphones a quality product, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: doctorwho

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones for what I use them for, which is not disturbing the whife when I am on the computer. Sometimes I will plug my phone into the base unit so I can listen to my music while doing chores. Great little unit, recommended,
customer_reviews.author: Master Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've found
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with these, yes they are quite expensive, but they're truly the first wireless headphones I've found without any annoying hiss or crackle, no matter whether you're sat still or moving around the house. I get a range of about 30m within victorian house, through big solid walls.
customer_reviews.author: bubbobz

customer_reviews.title: Quite simply the best headphones
customer_reviews.text: had a few bad experiences with cheaper headphones, so decided to push the boat out, glad I did, excellent headphones, noise canceling works great, the other night I was watching End Game and my wife fell down the stairs, I didn't hear a thing, she was screaming for help for hours but all I could hear was crystal clear movie sound, a true testament to the skill and engineering of the designers, 10 /10 from me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset
customer_reviews.text: After returning several other headsets, I found these to have great sound quality for the price. Battery life is good - having been using daily for several weeks and they charge well and have not failed me yet. Over ear headset works well for me and I am really pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: A pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.text: When you are wearing these it is difficult to adjust the volume. You need to find a flat button. Needs a raised dot on the moulding to locate it better.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling product, very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, cheaply made, cheep plastic not a £200 product, not even close, wouldn't pay more than £30.
customer_reviews.author: stephen ward

customer_reviews.title: Good alrounder
customer_reviews.text: Not bad upgraded from rs170 nice sound lasts long enough but bass not as good as previous pair
customer_reviews.author: Lhasafan

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Can pick up interference. Ok once I moved the WiFi hub to the other side of the room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the buttons placement but the thing I actually don't like it's the low weight of the docking station
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to the buttons placement but the thing I actually don't like it's the low weight of the docking station. Its base is also very small so if's easy to trip it over with the headphones weighting twice as much and quite tightly squeezing the station.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Headphones Made For Comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones, I can use them in my garden while I am working and anywhere in the house; also very comfortable. Well worth the money!.
customer_reviews.author: Marie2015

customer_reviews.title: U have to press the power button 4s seconds 4 the sound to come in
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this item, it is very helfull if u r very hard of hearing like me.This is 2cnd one I have recieved ,the 1st only lasted 4 weeks which I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Sponge

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Really good Wi-Fi earphones - great for watching TV in the garden without the neighbours complaining! and really good sound, like being at the cinema and very comfortable to wear. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable sound. Very easy to set up and use. Can't possibly be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good range and sound
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable on your ears and the sound is very good through them, wireless range is quite good too, easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: lunnys

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but high quality headphones with equally high-quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound (with or without the added bass feature), sturdy fit on the head and very user-friendly controls. I did have some interference with my wireless router which was nearby, but I changed the frequency channel on the router and i've had no issues since.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Only use these for TV after wife has gone to bed. They are the best headphones that I have had, the clarity of sound is excellent. So far I have not encountered any of the problems outlined in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Happydays

customer_reviews.title: Music to my ears... outstanding sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Using on pc with optical output had many pc headsets like Logitech astros Corsair etc all have had mics but they lack in sound quality these however are on another level sound quality is far superior and now looking for a standalone mic to match the quality
customer_reviews.author: Garyh2010

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless for TV and Music!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headphones! I tried many wireless headphones by high end brands with Bluetooth transmitter - none of them worked. But these headphones are the best for TV and Music, no lags, no delays, no noise - just perfect sound!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up and use, comfortable on the head. I wear spec's, and these headphones don't crush the ear-loops against my head. The sound is good, and the range from the base charger unit to the headphones is more than enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E. Bray

customer_reviews.title: top rated.
customer_reviews.text: love these. easy to understand and operate. good quality sound and over ear. i recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: mr. consumer.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones that I have ever had, love the selection you have of volume, bass and two surround sound settings. The only downer and I am being very picky is to replace the headphones back onto the base for recharging can be a tad fiddly.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but excellent headphones, son wears these for surround sound gaming ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but excellent headphones, son wears these for surround sound gaming for many hours per day, but also very good for music... Lots of research done before taking the plunge on these , no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Techsavvy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Albums I've listened to for years are full of surprises I hadn't heard before listening through these. A must for music lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive items just as good
customer_reviews.text: Main disappointment is if more than 10 meters away from receiver,no good,everything else is just ok not anything special ,would not have bought if known
customer_reviews.author: mickm

customer_reviews.title: These are the best wireless headphones out there for under £500
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wireless headphones out there for under £500. Amazing technology for the money. My hi fi cost eight thousand quid,and these do it justice. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: NAS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item - great sound quality and a good range of reception
customer_reviews.author: Paul Andersson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fn Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Very little I can say about these other than:- Absolutely Fn Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Invictus Maneo

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant set of headphones. I use them for 70 hours a week and these are very comfortable and the sound quality is perfect. Bass is great too for music. Only thing that is a bit unnecessary is the surround sound, but then just don't use it if you don't want to! batteries are still going even after a 14 hour day too.
customer_reviews.author: david payne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Product, excellent value. The headphones are easy to set up and the sound quality is amazing, I purchased the extra set of headphones and both work together from the one transmitter without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Baz

customer_reviews.title: TOP QUALITY JUST AS I EXSPECTED FROM SENNHEISER I HAVE ...
customer_reviews.text: TOP QUALITY JUST AS I EXSPECTED FROM SENNHEISER I HAVE HAD THEM BEFORE BUT ALWAYS CHEAPER ONES THIS ONE WAS WELL WORTH THE EXTRA MONEY
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Newby

customer_reviews.title: value for money
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable plenty of options flat response if you want but oodles of bass with boost button
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: ... a little worn after 8 years I am very pleased I updated
customer_reviews.text: My earlier wireless sensitisers getting a little worn after 8 years I am very pleased I updated. Lightweight and Comfortable. Open airy sound. Surround mode very good for both TV and music. A big improvement. Only negative is they look a bit plastic but they are very light and easy to wear for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: A. lee

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Top quality, TV at bedtime without waking up my GF.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: My day starts and ends with this gem
customer_reviews.text: If you are a bass lover...try this.. It's is a mammoth skull shaker.... Love it... Thanks Amazon for being there for us... The best company on earth
customer_reviews.author: emilgeorge4321

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: Simple, charge it, plug it in, set the tv to the right output channel, that is it, it then works superbly, great sound.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time lucky
customer_reviews.text: These do what the 165 didn't. They allow my husband to hear the TV perfectly while we watch it at normal volume. The 165 were a waste of time. The 175 are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate headphones and worth every penny!!! :) : ) : )
customer_reviews.author: Mcand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound easy to set up and use worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Can't rate highly enough
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is ace, as one would expect from Sennheiser. Hook it up to the TV with an optical cable and the sound is immense!
customer_reviews.author: Jct Willett

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant sound quality.It's not gotten 5 stars just because my wife can still hear the sound coming out of the headphones, so the external sound insulation could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: N. M. D. Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have ever brought off amazon. Booming bass, light weight, charging stand (but can still change batteries), but best of all zero back noise e.g. if tv is off or just no sound at all it is like the headphones are switched off, you get non of that hissing sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I watch tv & play music I like a lot. My second pair
customer_reviews.author: IAN KEITH BARRACLOUGH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. Recommend it for those of us that ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Recommend it for those of us that have difficulty in hearing the TV. Would have preferred it supplied wit a longer more flexible optical cable, had to by a longer optical cable in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for the hard of hearing
customer_reviews.text: It would be a good product if the volume control worked. It just doesn't go high enough!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John Opie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It’s an awesome wireless headphones is sennheiser RS 175-U Digital Tv
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones, sound v good, comfy. Quite suitable for tv watching.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality item. Only v minor issue is it makes your ears sweat after 30 mins of wearing
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these, sound lovely and work as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Emmjay

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend .
customer_reviews.text: Surpassed my expectations , The clarity of voices is brilliant when watching TV , Music is great with the bass boost , Although surround sound is a bit gimmicky ,it does give some depth when watching movies .
customer_reviews.author: middaymoses

customer_reviews.title: really happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Wow what an exceptional set of headphones, really happy with these, and they weren't overpriced either. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: James Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Top class product! These allow you to indulge in ...
customer_reviews.text: Top class product! These allow you to indulge in a personal surround sound cinema experience without scaring the dog or waking the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Oznob

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of kit. The sound quality is perfect for watching tv at night without waking anyone up. Easy to set-up and use!
customer_reviews.author: M Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service, great price
customer_reviews.text: Product (Sennheiser RS175) arrived earlier than expected. The richness of the sound is incredible, I am really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas present - one of the best EVER! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ballavilley

customer_reviews.title: very good produt
customer_reviews.text: what an amazing product really recommend it. I did a lot of homework before i chose this product and although expensive i am very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These heaphones are an excellent product. Really practical, and they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Phil. R

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied, amazing sound quality, reception range well under 100m
customer_reviews.author: neil r,j, friestad

customer_reviews.title: No more arguments about the television volume. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Can now hear everything that is being said on the television without having the television volume up loud. My brother in law has also bought a pair and he thinks that they are marvellous.
customer_reviews.author: Band

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative for my 6.5 years old Sennheiser RS170, which was pretty good in its time, and i choose this RS 175. It is brilliant, completely noiseless, working far even through walls etc. just like the old RS170, but this actually sounds even better, especially the bass is better. It is a bit tighter on the head, than the RS170 was, but in return, it doesn't want to fall off from my head. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gabor

customer_reviews.title: Poor Range
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with range. Bought to replace very old Sony wireless but the Sony beats it for range hands down. Only really useable when very close to base station or with little obstruction For example, with base station in conservatory pointing through window, I loose reception in garden when going behind a shrub about 30 feet away even though I can still clearly see the base station. When reception is received towards the limit of its range, it cuts out every time you move your head.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McLaren

customer_reviews.title: Sennheisser wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Works well easy to fit, comes with all the cables. I personally used the optic cable good sound quality no noticeable leakage. Light and comfortable to wear. Good range. Cheaper than a sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sound
customer_reviews.text: Top quality sound - range was a bit dissapointing - wouldn't reach the bottom of my garden
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality sound, but dont leave the room the station is in,they dont work even 1 wall will cut off signal, I sent these back and bought Panasonic 950T for £60, great for garden,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No range at all, do not be fooled by 100m claimed
customer_reviews.text: No range at all, left the room with tv in and lost signal. Returned them and have gone back to old RS120's with an optical/analogue converter instead. Even when in the room with the tv the difference was not good enough to justify the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and reception good, unfortunately lost contact very easily if moving about ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and reception good, unfortunately lost contact very easily if moving about the house. Surely this is the whole reason for buying wireless.!! Hence the reason for only three stars.
customer_reviews.author: ken.

customer_reviews.title: It hates obstacles in its wireless path...
customer_reviews.text: This pair of headphones has a decent sound for the price they cost. I was expecting that. I also expected to listen to music all around the house. From the living room to the bedroom there is one wall in between. The music cuts off and the set becomes useless. They say range 100 meters but it only takes a wall and a wardrobe to stop the signal. Shame really because the job I wanted it to do it just doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: E. G. Frouzakis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality and adjustments features
customer_reviews.text: Although relatively expensive the sound quality and adjustable features for bass and surround sound more than compensates. Superior to previously bought Thomson headphones. Also liked the comfort fit cushioned ear pads
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Field

product_meta.title: Sennheiser RS175-U Digital TV Wireless Headphones
product_meta.description: Style Name:RS 175 2019 VersionTaking home entertainment to the next level, Sennheiser’s RS 175 offers an impressive range of features in a compact, ergonomic package, so that you can enjoy music and television to the fullest. The bass Boost and surround sound listening modes will allow you to experience your home entertainment system like never before – the former increases the audio bass response while the two virtual surround modes offer a more spatial and livelier stereo sound. Sennheiser’s RS 175: Home entertainment just got more entertaining.
feature_bullets: Closed, circumaural headphones with excellent digital wireless audio transmission
Exceptional digital audio clarity and transmission range of up to 328ft/100m (line of sight)
Multi-purpose transmitter – also functions as ‘easy-charge’ cradle and docking station
Multi-receiver transmission – Transmitter supports up to two pairs of headphones simultaneously
Intelligently designed controls for maximum ease of use
